name: Kotlin developer
description:
Hey, it is First Stage Labs! We are a venture studio focused on building and scaling Web3-startups for mass audiences from the ground up. We partner with exceptional founders, share our extensive expertise in product development, marketing and design with the goal to reach an escape velocity together.

We are looking for a Kotlin developer for our portfolio company TON Play .

TON Play is a platform that, on the one hand, allows players to find and play cool NFT games and, on the other, lets developers easily integrate their games and seamlessly work with blockchain.

We are looking for a Kotlin developer with the middle/middle+ level. The main task will be to integrate the marketplace with the fifth generation's blockchain.

Our stack: kotlin, spring cloud, postgres, hibernate, kafka, webflux

What we expect:

  • Working knowledge of Kotlin

  • Practical skills at Spring - OOP

  • Knowledge of Git, SQL

  • Ability to work in a team

What may become your advantage:

  • Trunk Based Development

  • Knowledge of CI/CD methodology

  • Knowledge of Java

  • Knowledge of webflux / kotlin flow / coroutines

  • Experience in the development of microservices

What you will do:

  • Take part in creating the web application architecture

  • Development of backend-services

  • Database design and normalization (third normal form);

  • REST API design using Open API or JSON API format;

  • Work with Docker and CI/CD pipelines;

  • Autotests development;

  • Work within modern methodologies (Agile, DevOps)

  • Application monitoring (Grafana, StatsD, etc.);

  • Work in a cross-functional product team

What we offer:

  • Competitive salary based on the candidate's knowledge and experience

  • Small team, no red tape, and a short path from idea to implementation.

  • Well-equipped office with a panoramic view of Neva river with chameleons, specialty coffee, and Playstation 5. You can work remotely if you are not a big fan of coffee and chameleons.

  • Flexible hours, VHI policy (including dental care), English courses in the office.
